#define CONFIG_OS_DEBUG   true
 Set this config to true to activate the Debug Mode.
#define CONFIG_OS_DEBUG_UINT8_PATTERN   0xaa
 Defines the default character used to initialy fill the stack.
#define CONFIG_OS_DEFAULT_SR_VALUE   0x00400000
 This is the default value assigned to the Status Register (SR) before running a new task.
#define CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_IRQ_PRIORITY   0
 IRQ priority of the tick interrupt.
#define CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_TC_CHANNEL   0
 TC channel used to generate the tick interrupt.
#define CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_TYPE   CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_USE_COMPARE
 Defines the type of scheduler to be used. Values can be found here (Scheduler Type).
#define CONFIG_OS_TASK_DEFAULT_PRIORITY   OS_PRIORITY_1
 Default priority assgined to a task.
#define CONFIG_OS_TICK_HZ   1000
 Set the tick frequency in Hz. This configuration is not used if CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_COOPERATIVE is chosen.
#define CONFIG_OS_USE_16BIT_TICKS   false
 Use a 16-bits variable to define the tick counter.
#define CONFIG_OS_USE_CUSTOM_MALLOC   false
 Use a custom memory allocator. The user needs to define os_malloc and os_free to allocate/free the memory.
#define CONFIG_OS_USE_MALLOC   true
 Use os_malloc and os_free to allocate/free the memory for the stack.
#define CONFIG_OS_USE_PRIORITY   true
 Set this config to true in order to enable task priority support.
#define CONFIG_OS_USE_STATISTICS   true
 Defines if statistics should be enabled.
#define CONFIG_OS_USE_TICK_COUNTER   true
 This configuration will enable the tick counter.
#define CONFIG_OS_USE_EVENTS   false
 Use this option to enable event support.
#define CONFIG_OS_USE_SW_INTERRUPTS   false
 Use this option to enable software interrupts.
#define CONFIG_OS_INTERRUPT_DEFAULT_PRIORITY   OS_PRIORITY_1
 Default priority assgined to an interrupt.
#define CONFIG_OS_STATISTICS_TASK_SWITCHING   true
 Give statistics about the task switching. This enables the following functions:

Detailed Description

Configuration flags available to customize the behavior of the OS.

Define Documentation

#define CONFIG_OS_DEBUG   true

Set this config to true to activate the Debug Mode.

#define CONFIG_OS_DEBUG_UINT8_PATTERN   0xaa

Defines the default character used to initialy fill the stack.

Precondition:
Used when CONFIG_OS_DEBUG is set to true

Definition at line 30 of file os_debug.h.

#define CONFIG_OS_DEFAULT_SR_VALUE   0x00400000

This is the default value assigned to the Status Register (SR) before running a new task.

SR: [M2:M0]=001 I1M=0 I0M=0, GM=0.

Definition at line 45 of file os_port.h.

Referenced by os_process_context_load().

#define CONFIG_OS_INTERRUPT_DEFAULT_PRIORITY   OS_PRIORITY_1

Default priority assgined to an interrupt.

Definition at line 48 of file os_interrupt.h.

Referenced by os_interrupt_setup().

#define CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_IRQ_PRIORITY   0

IRQ priority of the tick interrupt.

Definition at line 53 of file os_port.h.

Referenced by os_setup_scheduler().

#define CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_TC_CHANNEL   0

TC channel used to generate the tick interrupt.

Precondition:
CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_USE_TC must be used

Definition at line 62 of file os_port.h.

#define CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_TYPE   CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_USE_COMPARE

Defines the type of scheduler to be used. Values can be found here (Scheduler Type).

This operating system can use cooperative and pre-emptive tasks together. To allow only cooperative tasks, set the value to CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_COOPERATIVE.

#define CONFIG_OS_STATISTICS_TASK_SWITCHING   true

Give statistics about the task switching. This enables the following functions:

Precondition:
CONFIG_OS_STATISTICS_TASK_SWITCHING must be set
  • os_statistics_get_task_switch_time
  • os_statistics_get_task_switch_time_jitter

Definition at line 32 of file os_statistics.h.

#define CONFIG_OS_TASK_DEFAULT_PRIORITY   OS_PRIORITY_1

Default priority assgined to a task.

Referenced by os_task_create().

#define CONFIG_OS_TICK_HZ   1000

Set the tick frequency in Hz. This configuration is not used if CONFIG_OS_SCHEDULER_COOPERATIVE is chosen.

Definition at line 161 of file os_core.h.

Referenced by os_setup_scheduler().

#define CONFIG_OS_USE_16BIT_TICKS   false

Use a 16-bits variable to define the tick counter.

Precondition:
CONFIG_OS_USE_TICK_COUNTER needs to be defined first.
#define CONFIG_OS_USE_CUSTOM_MALLOC   false

Use a custom memory allocator. The user needs to define os_malloc and os_free to allocate/free the memory.
